nome: Kami nomi zo Shiru Sekai: 4-nin to Idol

metadata_completo.titulo_oficial: Kami nomi zo Shiru Sekai: 4-nin to Idol
metadata_completo.titulo_ingles: The World God Only Knows: Four Girls and an Idol
metadata_completo.sinopse:
Eli, Chihiro, and Miyako try to form a band but end up looking to Katsuragi for help. In the process they meet Kanon and become friends/ rivals.

(Source: ANN)
